enforcementMode.description: The enforcement mode of the group. Can also be defined per collection type by using ProtectionMode

protectionMode.description: The protection mode of the group per collection type. Can also be defined for all collection types by using EnforcementMode

properties.description: Represents a VM/server group and set of rules that are Recommended by Microsoft Defender for Cloud to be allowed

location.description: Location where the resource is stored

exe.description: The application control policy enforcement/protection mode of the VM/server group

msi.description: The application control policy enforcement/protection mode of the VM/server group

script.description: The application control policy enforcement/protection mode of the VM/server group

executable.description: The application control policy enforcement/protection mode of the VM/server group

configurationStatus.description: The configuration status of the VM/server group or machine or rule on the machine

recommendationAction.description: The recommendation action of the VM/server or rule

resourceId.description: The full azure resource id of the machine

enforcementSupport.description: The VM/server supportability of Enforce feature

path.description: The full path to the application to allow

action.description: The recommendation action of the VM/server or rule

type.description: The type of the rule to be allowed

publisherInfo.description: Represents the publisher information of a process/rule

common.description: Whether the path is commonly run on the machine

fileType.description: The type of the file (for Linux files - Executable is used)

configurationStatus.description: The configuration status of the VM/server group or machine or rule on the machine

publisherName.description: The Subject field of the x.509 certificate used to sign the code, using the following fields -  O = Organization, L = Locality, S = State or Province, and C = Country

productName.description: The product name taken from the file's version resource

binaryName.description: The "OriginalName" field taken from the file's version resource

version.description: The binary file version taken from the file's version resource

username.description: Represents a user that is recommended to be allowed for a certain rule

recommendationAction.description: The recommendation action of the VM/server or rule

enforcementMode.description: The application control policy enforcement/protection mode of the VM/server group

protectionMode.description: The protection mode of the collection/file types. Exe/Msi/Script are used for Windows, Executable is used for Linux.

configurationStatus.description: The configuration status of the VM/server group or machine or rule on the machine

recommendationStatus.description: The recommendation status of the VM/server group or VM/server

sourceSystem.description: The source type of the VM/server group

issue.description: An alert that VMs/servers within a group can have

numberOfVms.description: The number of machines in the VM/server group that have this alert

location.description: Location where the resource is stored

provisioningState.description: Gets the provisioning state of the Just-in-Time policy.

id.description: Resource ID of the virtual machine that is linked to this policy

ports.description: Port configurations for the virtual machine

publicIpAddress.description: Public IP address of the Azure Firewall that is linked to this policy, if applicable

allowedSourceAddressPrefix.description: Mutually exclusive with the "allowedSourceAddressPrefixes" parameter. Should be an IP address or CIDR, for example "192.168.0.3" or "192.168.0.0/16".

maxRequestAccessDuration.description: Maximum duration requests can be made for. In ISO 8601 duration format. Minimum 5 minutes, maximum 1 day

startTimeUtc.description: The start time of the request in UTC

requestor.description: The identity of the person who made the request

justification.description: The justification for making the initiate request

id.description: Resource ID of the virtual machine that is linked to this policy

ports.description: The ports that were opened for the virtual machine

allowedSourceAddressPrefix.description: Mutually exclusive with the "allowedSourceAddressPrefixes" parameter. Should be an IP address or CIDR, for example "192.168.0.3" or "192.168.0.0/16".

endTimeUtc.description: The date & time at which the request ends in UTC

statusReason.description: A description of why the `status` has its value

mappedPort.description: The port which is mapped to this port's `number` in the Azure Firewall, if applicable

properties.description: Properties of the Adaptive Network Hardening resource

rules.description: The security rules which are recommended to be effective on the VM

rulesCalculationTime.description: The UTC time on which the rules were calculated

effectiveNetworkSecurityGroups.description: The Network Security Groups effective on the network interfaces of the protected resource

ipAddresses.description: The remote IP addresses that should be able to communicate with the Azure resource on the rule's destination port and protocol

networkInterface.description: The Azure resource ID of the network interface

networkSecurityGroups.description: The Network Security Groups effective on the network interface

state.description: State of the alert (Active, Dismissed etc.)

reportedTimeUtc.description: The time the incident was reported to Microsoft.Security in UTC

vendorName.description: Name of the vendor that discovered the incident

alertDisplayName.description: Display name of the alert type

detectedTimeUtc.description: The time the incident was detected by the vendor

description.description: Description of the incident and what it means

remediationSteps.description: Recommended steps to reradiate the incident

actionTaken.description: The action that was taken as a response to the alert (Active, Blocked etc.)

compromisedEntity.description: The entity that the incident happened on

associatedResource.description: Azure resource ID of the associated resource

extendedProperties.description: Changing set of properties depending on the alert type.

systemSource.description: The type of the alerted resource (Azure, Non-Azure)

canBeInvestigated.description: Whether this alert can be investigated with Azure Security Center

isIncident.description: Whether this alert is for incident type or not (otherwise - single alert)

entities.description: objects that are related to this alerts

confidenceScore.description: level of confidence we have on the alert

confidenceReasons.description: reasons the alert got the confidenceScore value

subscriptionId.description: Azure subscription ID of the resource that had the security alert or the subscription ID of the workspace that this resource reports to

workspaceArmId.description: Azure resource ID of the workspace that the alert was reported to.

correlationKey.description: Alerts with the same CorrelationKey will be grouped together in Ibiza.

properties.description: Describes the allowed traffic between Azure resources

location.description: Location where the resource is stored

calculatedDateTime.description: The UTC time on which the allowed connections resource was calculated

inboundConnectedResources.description: The list of Azure resources that the resource has inbound allowed connection from

outboundConnectedResources.description: The list of Azure resources that the resource has outbound allowed connection to

connectedResourceId.description: The Azure resource id of the connected resource

location.description: Location where the resource is stored

securityFamily.description: The security family of the discovered solution

kind.description: The kind of the external solution

location.description: Location where the resource is stored

state.description: State of the task (Active, Resolved etc.)

creationTimeUtc.description: The time this task was discovered in UTC

securityTaskParameters.description: Changing set of properties, depending on the task type that is derived from the name field

lastStateChangeTimeUtc.description: The time this task's details were last changed in UTC

subState.description: Additional data on the state of the task

location.description: Location where the resource is stored

calculatedDateTime.description: The UTC time on which the topology was calculated

topologyResources.description: Azure resources which are part of this topology resource

severity.description: The security severity of the resource

recommendationsExist.description: Indicates if the resource has security recommendations

networkZones.description: Indicates the resource connectivity level to the Internet (InternetFacing, Internal ,etc.)

topologyScore.description: Score of the resource based on its security severity

parents.description: Azure resources connected to this resource which are in higher level in the topology view

children.description: Azure resources connected to this resource which are in lower level in the topology view

resourceId.description: Azure resource id which serves as parent resource in topology view
Azure resource id which serves as child resource in topology view

networkSecurityGroups.description: The Azure resource IDs of the effective network security groups that will be updated with the created security rules from the Adaptive Network Hardening rules

virtualMachines.description: A list of virtual machines & ports to open access for

justification.description: The justification for making the initiate request

id.description: Resource ID of the virtual machine that is linked to this policy

ports.description: The ports to open for the resource with the `id`

allowedSourceAddressPrefix.description: Source of the allowed traffic. If omitted, the request will be for the source IP address of the initiate request.

endTimeUtc.description: The time to close the request in UTC
